page.title: 11TRANSPORT FIRMS
page.content:
The{Chartercoach}firm was founded in 1981 by the combining of Harwich and Dovercourt coaches and Hooks coaches.They operate from the{Hooks {garage,}Gt. Oakley.{Chartercoach}has 15 coaches, 8 of which are luxury coaches. Each coach costs over {Â£100,000}.They take people on holidays in Paris, Amsterdam, Cologne, Luxembourg and the Ardennes. Three days in Paris cost{Â£45.}Chartercoach also take children to Wix and Tendring Primary Schools and to The Harwich School. {Deex}Company operates 4 lorries from their depot in farm road, they transport}farm produce mainly.
_
